title: Tim Bontemps
description:
Zach and ESPN's Tim Bontemps bounce around the East: the unbeaten Bulls, buzzy Hornets, the clunky Nets start, Boston, Toronto, much more. Plus, some tidbits on the West, including whether the Thunder might sniff 9-73. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
